description: Thousands gathered across France and ignored social distancing rules to celebrate the annual event.
title: Coronavirus: French defy lockdown with Festival of Music
title_page: Coronavirus: French defy lockdown with Festival of Music - BBC News
maintext: In France people are supposed to maintain 1m (3.3ft) distance from each other in public, masks are required on all public transport and gatherings of 5,000 or more will not be allowed until 31 August at the earliest.
